Class Calendar

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.model.Calendar
public class Calendar extends Object
This class handles the calendar functionality of the application.

    • searchRecipes

      public static ArrayList<String> searchRecipes(String search, boolean vegetarian)
      Search the database for recipes with a name that contains the search string.
      Parameters:
      search - the string to search the database for.
      vegetarian - whether to search for vegetarian recipes.
      Returns:
      an arraylist containing the names of the recipes that match the search string.
